title: Colligo Named KMWorld Trend-Setting Product for Third Year Running
text: Colligo Named KMWorld Trend-Setting Product for Third Year Running Friday, October 23, 2015 Company Profile | Careers | Follow Company Colligo Engage named 2015 Trend-Setting Product by Leading Industry Magazine   23, 2015--(T-Net)-- Colligo , a leading provider of data synchronization solutions for Microsoft SharePoint/Office 365, announced recently that for the third year running, a Colligo product has been recognized for its excellence by KMWorld. Colligo Engage , the company's flagship app platform, has been named a KMWorld 2015 Trend-Setting Product . In its 13th year, the list of top products is assembled through consultation with industry experts. “Throughout the year-long collaborative judging process, we looked at more than 200 vendors, whose combined product lineups include more than 1,000 separate offerings,” comments Hugh McKellar, editor in chief for KMWorld . “As in years past, we all agreed that usability, flexibility, adoption rate and total cost of ownership were valuable components for inclusion. Our committee further agreed that each company/product listed holds the promise for the marketplace - even if the marketplace has yet to realize it.” KMWorld's panel of judges includes editorial colleagues, market and technology analysts, knowledge management theoreticians and practitioners, customers and select users in a variety of disciplines to identify products that fulfill the ultimate goal of knowledge management - delivering the right information to the right people at the right time. “Gaining a third product excellence award in as many years solidifies our reputation as an innovative company that focuses on solving the challenges customers face in their SharePoint and Office 365 deployments,” says Barry Jinks, CEO, Colligo. “We would like to thank KMWorld for this recognition and applaud their work in pulling together a well-respected panel of judges for this award program.” About Colligo Colligo is the leading provider of data synchronization solutions for Microsoft SharePoint. The company's award-winning, unified solution suite is used by over 5,000 organizations worldwide to increase productivity, streamline collaboration, and improve compliance, by delivering a consistent, secure experience across desktop and mobile devices. Colligo is a Microsoft Gold Application Development Partner with Global 500 customers including 4 of the top 5 global oil and gas companies, Microsoft, EDF Energy, Bayer and the US Department of Energy. For more information, please visit www.colligo.com. For further information, please contact : Asa Zanatta
